short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to express your HATRED towards websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to dislike (hate) websites and leave negative comments. You can see what others have hated over at the main website, ihathis.site
